long_description: Designed for toddlers and infants weighing up to 30 lbs., the Stohlquist Nemo PFD enhances safety and comfort on the water. Padded head support has an additional foam band for increased security; design helps child naturally float face up. Stohlquist Nemo PFD features a large grab handle that makes it easy to retrieve a child out of the water. Easy-to-use front zipper and nylon crotch and waist straps with side-release buckles secure PFD comfortably, preventing ride-up. Durable 200-denier nylon oxford stands up to the rigors of paddling.
short_description: Designed for toddlers and infants weighing up to 30 lbs., the Stohlquist Nemo PFD enhances safety and comfort on the water.
